We hypothesize infusion saline + furosemide + mannitol reduce rate contrast-induced nephropathy compare saline infusion control . We define episode contrast nephropathy use conventional often publish definition 25 % relative increase serum creatinine OR 44 umol absolute increase serum creatinine within 48 hour contrast exposure .
